name: IntuitionTraining
description:
◆An app for training your intuition
The training time is limited in 60 seconds one time
Insight, reaction speed, concentration can be trained
The high level is recorded
◆Rule
If you make a good bridge, boy will go over the bridge
If the bridge is too short or too long, boy will be fallen off
◆How to make a bridge:
Touch down the screen, bridge making begins
Touch up the screen, bridge making finished
